tests.description: After rolling 7, player_3 with 9 resources should be able to discard, but no discard actions are available
tests.expected_behavior: Player_3 should have DISCARD_RESOURCES in legal actions when dice_roll=7, player has 8+ resources, and hasn't discarded yet
tests.undesired_behavior: No discard actions available for player_3 even though they have 9 resources and need to discard

tests.description: LLM agent test: Verify agent can discard resources after rolling 7
tests.expected_behavior: LLM agent should successfully choose discard_resources action, generate DiscardResourcesPayload with correct resources, and execute the discard
tests.undesired_behavior: Agent fails to discard, generates None payload, or discards incorrect amount
